Sentence.sentence: The increasing differences in child rearing between rich and poor families reflect growing social inequality.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The class differences in child rearing are growing—a symptom of widening inequality with far-reaching consequences.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Some socioeconomic differences in child rearing have shrunk in the past ten years.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Social scientists say the differences arise in part because low-income parents have less money to spend on music class or preschool, and less flexible schedules to take children to museums or attend school events.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In the past decade, even as income inequality has grown, some of the socioeconomic differences in parenting, like reading to children and going to libraries, have narrowed.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Extracurricular activities reflect the differences in child rearing in the Pew survey, which was of a nationally representative sample of 1,807 parents.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Addressing differences in the earliest years, it seems, could reduce inequality in the next generation.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: There's solid evidence that there are huge differences in the effectiveness of teachers.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: There're steps we can take that would make some difference, and Mayor Rahm Emanuel is trying some of them—yet the union is resisting.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Contrary to some stereotypes, most adolescents believe they must be tolerant of differences among individuals ( ' , though they do not always find this easy in the cliquish ( ' ,  拉帮结派的) environment of high school).
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Researchers at Duke University scrutinized more than 160 published studies and found an absence of strong evidence that any of these approaches can make a big difference.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: In one example that demonstrated genetic differences  were  not  fixed  along  racial  lines,  the  full  genomes  ( ' ,  基因组 )  of   James  Watson  and  Craig  Venter,  two  famous  American scientists of European ancestry, were compared to that of a Korean scientist, Seong-Jin Kim.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: E.B.Du Bois was concerned that race was being used as a  biological explanation for what he understood to be social and cultural differences between different populations  of people.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Assumptions about genetic differences between people of different races could be particularly dangerous  in a medical setting.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We hope you enjoy the series about how you can make a difference by becoming a social worker.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: On this task, they found large differences.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A recent study, conducted by Emory University's Erika Hall, found that Black people are viewed more negatively than African Americans because of a perceived difference in socioeconomic status.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A recent study, conducted by Emory University's Erika Hall, found that " Black " people are viewed more negatively than " African Americans " because of a perceived difference in socioeconomic status.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: I know it's the end of high school, but many of my classmates are going on to the same university and we are still required to study hard, so what's the difference?
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: In the meantime, 70-year-old Corliss Keith, who was in the high protein group in Starr's latest study, says the feels a big difference.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: On the less cute and more scary side there is Actroid F, which is so human-like that some patients may not know the difference.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The big difference between "drought-tolerant" plants and these tough plants: metabolism.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: This little bit of support can sometimes make a big difference.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: This mood switch made no difference to the three-month-olds; but for the nine-month-olds, it was enough to renew their interest and they started looking again in the direction of the face.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: This suggests that babies of that age can tell the difference between a happy melody and a sad tune.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"差别，区别"之意。
means: difference ： 普通用词，可指事物本质上的差异或数量上的差额，也可指事物在某一方面的差别，还可指人们之间的不同意见。
distinction ： 较正式用词，除指事物在本质上的差别外，还指在某一方面或某一细节上的区分，要在认真观察、研究后才易觉察。
discrepancy ： 多用于言论和记述方面，指两物之间缺乏使之相似或平衡的协调。
discrimination ： 侧重指在判断、见识方面的差别，也可指待遇上的区别。

Sentence.sentence: Another study of 302 volunteers at hospitals in Chicago focused on individual differences in the degree to which people view "volunteer" as an important social role.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Before birth, babies can tell the difference between loud sounds and voices.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: But one difference: fewer of this year's graduates have started to search for jobs.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: But there's a difference between being a victim and living with a "victim mentality".
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite their many differences, all human beings share several defining characteristics.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 任务型阅读 原文

Sentence.sentence: Hannah is one of many examples of young people who are making a difference in the world.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: He began studying them, trying to learn the differences between the birds and noticing their different behaviors.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: He told us to consider the difference in the price "an early wedding present".
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: However, there is a very important difference between wanting to do something and applying for something.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: "I knew it was the difference between life and death," says Taylor.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Ignoring the difference between the two research findings will be one of the worst mistakes you make.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Little people can make a big difference.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读B 选项

Sentence.sentence: One important biological factor that helps women live longer is the difference in hormones between men and women.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Since then, many scientists have thought that our actions do make a difference.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: The city planner decided to build an underground drainage system, but there simply wasn't enough difference between the height of the ground level and the water level.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: The differences between weak and strong links in food webs.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 选项

Sentence.sentence: The friendship that grew out of the experience of making that film and the sting four years later had its root in the fact that although there was an age difference, we both came from a tradition of theater and live TV.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: The researchers also found that IQ and family social and economic class made no real difference in how the boys turned out.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: They have a different kind of superpower that all of US possess: the power to make a difference in the lives of others.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: We can achieve a lot when we learn to let our differences unite, rather than divide us.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（6月） 单项选择 原文

Sentence.sentence: Whatever she says will not make any difference to our arrangements.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 句子填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: You may have the opportunity to make your biggest difference when you're older.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: There is a marked difference between the education which every one gets from living with others, and the deliberate educating of the young.
Sentence.come: 出自-2009年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: Closer inspection reveals important differences among the biggest national markets, especially in their customer segments and wholesale structures, as well as the competitive dynamics of individual food and drink categories.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Big retailers must understand these differences before they can identify the segments of European wholesaling in which their particular abilities might unseat smaller but entrenched competitors.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But what will be the nature of that difference? Merely expanding the orchestra’s repertoire will not be enough.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The difference between today’s workplace and the “dress for success” era is that the range of options is so much broader.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But what will be the nature of that difference?
Sentence.come: 2011年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: But with homework counting for no more than 10% of their grades, students can easily skip half their homework and see very little difference on their report cards.

Sentence.sentence: Epley found no significant gender difference in responses.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The difference between today's workplace and the "dress for success" era is that the range of options is so much broader.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Their clever designs and lightweight composites certainly make a difference.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: We know the difference between voluntary and involuntary part-time employment because people tell us.
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

means.word_mean: 差别, 差异,不同（之处）,变化（之处）

sentences.en: When the synthetic fabric is contrasted with the natural one, the difference is very apparent.
sentences.cn: 要是把合成纺织品和天然纺织品对比一下, 它们的差别就很明显了。

sentences.en: It is both important and necessary to note this difference.
sentences.cn: 注意到这个差距是重要的和必要的。

sentences.en: There's an age difference of six years between them.
sentences.cn: 他们之间相差六岁。

means.word_mean: 分歧, 争执,意见分歧,不和

sentences.en: Our differences were at last hammered out in discussion.
sentences.cn: 我们的分歧最后通过讨论消除了。</seg>

data.mean: 差别；差异；不同（之处）；变化（之处）
difference (to/in sb/sth) 有（或没有、有些等）作用，关系，影响

sentence.cn: 强制等待和监视锅等待之间有什么区别？
sentence.en: What is the difference between the forced wait and the watched-pot wait?
sentence.from: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 题设

mean.mean: 差别；差异；不同（之处）；变化（之处）

sentence.cn: 当你更成熟些时，可能有机会做出最大的改变。
sentence.en: You may have the opportunity to make your biggest difference when you’re older.
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

mean.mean: difference (to/in sb/sth) 有（或没有、有些等）作用，关系，影响

jx.jx_en_mean: have a significant effect (or no effect) on a person or situation
jx.jx_cn_mean: 对某人（或某个环境）产生重大影响（或没有影响）

lj.lj_ly: the Act will &B{make no difference to} my business.
lj.lj_ls: 这个法案对我的生意不会有什么影响。

jx.jx_en_mean: having a new or unusual feature or treatment
jx.jx_cn_mean: 有新（或不同寻常）的特点（或处理方法）的

lj.lj_ls: 一场别具一格的时装秀。

entry.def: The difference between two things is the way in which they are unlike each other.

example.ex: That is the fundamental difference between the two societies...
example.tran: 那是这两个社会之间的根本性差异。

example.ex: There is no difference between the sexes.

entry.def: A difference between two quantities is the amount by which one quantity is less than the other.
If people have their differences about something, they disagree about it.

example.ex: The two communities are learning how to resolve their differences.
example.tran: 这两个社群正在学着如何解决彼此之间的分歧。

entry.def: If something makes a difference or makes a lot of difference, it affects you and helps you in what you are doing. If something makes no difference, it does not have any effect on what you are doing.

example.ex: Where you live can make such a difference to the way you feel...
example.tran: 住在哪里会极大地影响你的感受。

entry.def: If you split the difference with someone, you agree on an amount or price which is halfway between two suggested amounts or prices.
entry.tran: （在数量、价格上）折中，各让一步

example.ex: Shall we split the difference and say $7,500?
example.tran: 我们折中一下，7,500 美元怎么样？

entry.def: If you describe a job or holiday, for example, as a job with a difference or a holiday with a difference, you mean that the job or holiday is very interesting and unusual.
entry.tran: 非常有趣的;与众不同的

example.ex: For a beach resort with a difference, try Key West.
example.tran: 如果想去一个与众不同的海滨度假胜地，那就去基韦斯特吧。

entry.def: If there is a difference of opinion between two or more people or groups, they disagree about something.

example.ex: Was there a difference of opinion over what to do with the Nobel Prize money?
example.tran: 在如何利用那笔诺贝尔奖金的问题上有不同意见吗？

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being unlike or dissimilar;

sentences.sentence: "there are many differences between jazz and rock"

means.word_mean: 2. a variation that deviates from the standard or norm;
3. a disagreement or argument about something important;

sentences.sentence: "he had a dispute with his wife"
"the familiar conflict between Republicans and Democrats"

means.word_mean: 5. the number that remains after subtraction; the number that when added to the subtrahend gives the minuend

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin differentia (see differentia)

sentences.cn: 他知不知道有什么关系吗？
sentences.en: What difference will it make if he knows or not?

sentences.cn: 我认为颜色无关紧要。
sentences.en: I don't think it makes a lot of difference what colour it is (= it is not important) .

sentences.cn: “我们星期五还是星期六去？”“我无所谓。”
sentences.en: ‘Shall we go on Friday or Saturday? ’ ‘It makes no difference (to me). ’

sentences.cn: 转学对我的一生有着重大影响。
sentences.en: Changing schools made a big difference to my life.

sentences.cn: 你能否得到这工作应该与你的年龄无关。
sentences.en: Your age shouldn't make any difference to whether you get the job or not.

sentences.cn: 这场雨对比赛没多大影响。
sentences.en: The rain didn't make much difference to the game.

sentences.cn: 在谁获胜的问题上发生了争执。
sentences.en: There was a difference of opinion over who had won.

sentences.cn: 你们为什么不消除隔阂，言归于好呢？
sentences.en: Why don't you settle your differences and be friends again?

sentences.cn: 我们之间虽然不和，但她仍旧是我的妹妹。
sentences.en: We have our differences , but she's still my sister.

sentences.cn: 我们测量了温度的变化。
sentences.en: We measured the difference in temperature.

sentences.cn: 这两个男孩的年龄相差六岁。
sentences.en: There's an age difference of six years between the boys (= one is six years older than the other) .

sentences.cn: 我借给你500英镑，其余的你自己解决。
sentences.en: I'll lend you £500 and you'll have to find the difference (= the rest of the money that you need) .

sentences.cn: 他在研究人和动物之间错综复杂的相似与不同之处。
sentences.en: He was studying the complex similarities and differences between humans and animals.

sentences.cn: 结果没有差别。
sentences.en: There's no difference in the results.

sentences.cn: 她第二次来访时注意到孩子们发生了明显的变化。
